meanings.definition: A fight between two individuals or groups.
meanings.sent1: The battel between the two knights was fierce.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers prepared for the battel against the enemy.
meanings.sent3: During the battel, the squirrels fought over the last acorn.
meanings.sent4: The battel for the title of champion lasted for hours.
meanings.sent5: The battel between the siblings over the TV remote was legendary.

meanings.definition: To engage in a battle or fight.
meanings.sent1: They decided to battel it out in the ring.
meanings.sent2: The warriors battel bravely against the invaders.
meanings.sent3: The kids playfully battel with foam swords in the park.
meanings.sent4: She had to battel her fear of heights to climb the mountain.
meanings.sent5: The teams will battel for victory in the championship match.

meanings.sent1: The battel between the nations lasted for years.
meanings.sent2: The generals strategized for the upcoming battel.
meanings.sent3: The food fight in the cafeteria turned into a messy battel.
meanings.sent4: The battel for control of the kingdom was intense.
meanings.sent5: The historical battel changed the course of the war.
